tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE treaties (
  treaty_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  treaty_name STRING,
  signing_country STRING,
  signing_date DATE,
  compliance_status STRING
)

CREATE TABLE treaty_agreements (
    treaty_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    treaty_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    country_signatory TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_signed DATE NOT NULL,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    violation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_details TEXT NOT NULL,
    country_perpetrator TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_occurred DATE NOT NULL,
    reported_by TEXT,
    resolution_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE treaties (
    treaty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    treaty_name STRING,
    country_signed STRING,
    signing_date DATE,
    compliance_status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE treaties (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treaty_name VARCHAR(255),
  signatory_countries VARCHAR(255),
  date_signed DATE,
  human_rights_compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE treaty_ratifications (
  ratification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treaty_id INT,
  ratifying_country VARCHAR(255),
  ratification_date DATE,
  foreign_policy_impact BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_id UUID REFERENCES international_agreements(agreement_id),
    party_id UUID REFERENCES agreement_parties(party_id),
    compliance_rating DECIMAL(5, 2),
    review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE treaty_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_id UUID REFERENCES international_agreements(agreement_id),
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(100),
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
